casebody.data:
ABDO
v.
KAHN CONSTRUCTION CO. No. 34A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 10, 2008. G. Gray Wilson, Winston-Salem, J. Chad Bomar, for Kahn Construction, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of March 2008 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of March 2008."
